steps.conclusion: None. The single suggestion correctly includes International Law, uses English, keeps the title under 5 words, avoids joiners and level words, sets is_language_course to false, and uses a tabler- prefixed icon. As a global law topic, no jurisdiction is required.
The output is minimal with only one suggestion; more relevant global law suggestions could increase usefulness. Everything else aligns with constraints.

Add more pertinent global law suggestions (e.g., International Human Rights Law, International Humanitarian Law, International Criminal Law, Law of Treaties, International Organizations Law) while keeping titles <=5 words and single-topic.
